id: Trump’s unwelcome visit to a city in mourning
paragraph: Washington Post’s Phil Rucker, Daily Beast’s Sam Stein and Betsy Woodruff, Washington Post columnist Eugene Robinson, and New York Times Bari Weiss on the Trump’s arrival in Pittsburgh as funeral services begin for the 11 victims killed in the synagogue shootingOct. 30, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
